tspan.tspan: You have successfully activated your NJ TRANSIT student mobile account! Use your account to purchase discounted
student monthly passes. Your student account is valid through July 15th, 2020.
Open the app and tap BUY
Sign in with your .edu email and password
Select your Student Monthly pass and pay for it in the app
On the 1st of the month your student pass will display in the app
Following the start of each semester, return to your schools web portal and click on the Existing NJ TRANSIT Mobile
Student Monthly Pass Account Management link to confirm your full-time status and continue through to purchase your
